hero.title: Is your advertising campaign delivering the maximum possible revenue?
hero.subtitle: We assist companies in scaling up by optimising their PPC spend for greater efficiency and stronger results.

options.title: Most of your PPC budget is likely being wasted right now
options.description: The tough truth: the overwhelming majority of PPC campaigns dramatically underdeliver. This usually translates to you paying far more than necessary for every lead and sale. In an industry overflowing with self-styled experts, it’s difficult to find someone you can truly rely on to meaningfully improve your ROI.
options.question: “So what can you actually do?”

option1.label: option 1
option1.title: Handling PPC internally
option1.intro: When large sums are going into advertising, it’s natural to consider managing the campaigns in-house

pro1.title: Lower upfront cost
pro1.text: - You save money immediately and keep full control over priorities.

con1.title: Expertise is critical
con1.text: - PPC is technically demanding, and advertising platforms are built to encourage continuous higher spend.

con2.title: Huge time demand
con2.text: - Your time has real value – should it be invested in learning complex ad systems or in developing your core business?

option2.label: option 2
option2.title: Working with a full-service digital agency
option2.intro: Many full-service agencies will encourage you to include PPC in their overall package

pro1.title: Almost no effort required
pro1.text: - One partner manages everything; no need to search for specialists.

con1.title: Marketing focus vs data focus
con1.text: - Most agencies excel at creative and branding work rather than relentless, numbers-driven ROI optimisation.

con2.title: Shallow specialisation
con2.text: - Achieving the lowest cost per lead and highest conversion value usually requires deep, specialised knowledge that broad agencies rarely have.

option3.label: option 3
option3.title: Employing a dedicated in-house PPC specialist
option3.intro: You can always closely monitor your in-house PPC specialist – could this be a stronger choice?

pro1.title: Strong alignment
pro1.text: - Your own employee is naturally motivated to prioritise company success.

con1.title: High long-term cost
con1.text: - ASalary, taxes, benefits, office costs, training and management overhead make this one of the most expensive routes.

con2.title: Major risk
con2.text: - If performance is below expectations, revenue and sales suffer quietly – often for months before the issue becomes obvious.
